<|python_start|>To update the rent payment for next month, I need to calculate new date. Assuming that "next month" means the same day in the next month, I'll assume that current month is April (4th month), and year 2022.

The next month would be May, so let's get id of scheduled transaction with subject 'Rent' which we received earlier as 7

To determine new date I need to know what type of field it represents. According to the function definition it's "Next date of the transaction (optional)". So I'll assume that format is also in a form similar to ISO 8601, i.e., YYYY-MM-DD.

<|python_end|>
